name: Dragon Ball Collection
original_name: ドラゴンボールシリーズ
overview: The collection brings together the four movies from the classic Dragon Ball anime where the adventures follow Goku as a child.

parts.original_title: ドラゴンボール 魔神城のねむり姫
parts.overview: Goku and Kuririn are given an assignment by Kame-Sen'nin: "Retrieve the sleeping princess from Lucifer and I will take you as my students." But the mission proves to be more perilous than originally thought.
parts.title: Dragon Ball: Sleeping Princess in Devil's Castle

parts.original_title: ドラゴンボール 最強への道
parts.overview: A retelling of Dragon Ball's origin with a different take on the meeting of Goku, Bulma, and Kame-Sen'nin. It also retells the Red Ribbon Army story; but this time they find Goku rather than Goku finding them.
parts.title: Dragon Ball: The Path to Power

parts.original_title: ドラゴンボール 魔訶不思議大冒険
parts.overview: Master Roshi has succeeded at the one mission he valued most: to train Goku and Krillin to become ultimate fighters. So, he arranges for them to test their mettle at a competition hosted by Emperor Chiaotzu. Not everyone's playing by the rules, however, as a member of the ruler's household schemes to use the Dragonballs to extort money and power from the royal.
parts.title: Dragon Ball: Mystical Adventure

parts.original_title: ドラゴンボール 神龍の伝説
parts.overview: The great King Gurumes is searching for the Dragon Balls in order to put a stop to his endless hunger. A young girl named Pansy who lives in the nearby village has had enough of the treachery and decides to seek Muten Rōshi for assistance. Can our heroes save the village and put a stop to the Gurumes Army?
parts.title: Dragon Ball: Curse of the Blood Rubies
